channel.title: Academic on Savo's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Academic on Savo's Site

item.title: Oscilloscope
item.description: Produced an Arduino-based USB oscilloscope capable of measuring signals up to 20kHz, with AC/DC coupling and hardware 1X/10X scaling

item.title: Mountain Bike Suspension
item.description: Developed a kinematic model in MATLAB to perform a design optimization of a mountain bike suspension system.
